existing_features.title: Update the Contact section UI to display the new address and phone number as the fallback values when `companyInfo` is unavailable (e.g., query fails or `companyInfo` is null).

new_feature_requests.summary: Update displayed address to "Pupri, Sitamarhi, Bihar, 843314, India" and contact number to "+91 8879802001"

Update the backend company information returned by `getCompanyInfo()` so that the address is "Pupri, Sitamarhi, Bihar, 843314, India" and the phone number is "+91 8879802001" (ensuring the UI receives these values).

projectName: Update company address and contact phone number
